name: Complete Visual Coherence Grid
description: 3x3 grid establishing the visual DNA for entire project
prompt: A 3x3 grid layout showing consistent visual DNA for {PROJECT_NAME}. Style: {GENRE_STYLE}. Color palette: {PRIMARY_COLORS}. Lighting: {LIGHTING_TYPE}. Composition: professional cinematic framing. Each panel shows the same scene from slightly different angles maintaining perfect style consistency, color harmony, and atmospheric coherence. High quality, sharp details, 4K resolution.

examples.PRIMARY_COLORS: electric blue, neon purple, chrome silver
